name: 6.2.5-nightly.0
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at develop -->

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* Updated npm packages by @vraravam in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/909
* feat(i18n): new Crowdin updates by @nathanaelhoun in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/895
* Bump uuid from 8.3.2 to 9.0.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/884
* Bump fs-extra from 10.1.0 to 11.1.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/885
* Bump react-dropzone from 11.7.1 to 14.2.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/887

## New Contributors

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/compare/v6.2.4-nightly.12...v6.2.5-nightly.0

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v6.2.4 -->

## What's Changed

### Major Changes
* Upgrade `electron` to `22.1.0`

### Other Changes
* Update `pnpm` and revert to stable `electron-builder`
* Upgrade `nodejs` to the latest LTS `18.13.0`
* Use dependabot to help fixing vulnerable dependencies and improve security
* Use service icon in notification; Decouple notification sound from notifications
* Fix fullscreen horizontal sidebar style
* Add custom CSS support

## New Contributors
* @abacao made their first contribution in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/875

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/compare/v6.2.3...v6.2.4

name: 6.2.4-nightly.1
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at develop -->

* Upgrade 'nodejs' to '16.19.0' and 'pnpm' to '7.19.0'
* Minor refactoring of internal code


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/compare/v6.2.3-nightly.11...v6.2.4-nightly.1

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v6.2.3 -->

## What's Changed
### Main Changes
* Windows users were getting a blank screen when the app started up (#814 ). This has been fixed in this version.

### Other Changes
* Backported deprecation fixes from electron v22 upgrade by @vraravam in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/826
* migrate gulp to esbuild for compile by @balajiv113 in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/815
* Fix #814 temporarily by disabling sentry by @vraravam in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/838
* Deleted the 'sentry' line in index.html - which mysteriously fixes #840 by @vraravam in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/841
* Fix #844: Correct language name to code mapping for dropdown by @vraravam in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/845
* Fix issues with executable when using portable on windows by @Alphrag in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/850
* Update retry action on builds by @Alphrag in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/851


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/compare/v6.2.2...v6.2.3

<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at v6.2.2 -->

## Major Changes
* Upgrade `electron` to `21.3.3`. This update includes a fix to an [high CVE](https://chromereleases.googleblog.com/2022/11/stable-channel-update-for-desktop_24.html) exploited in the wild

### Minor Changes
* Fix for #809 unable to save custom icon for any service by @muhamedsalih-tw in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/811

### Internal Changes
* refactor noop proper format by @muhamedsalih-tw in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/808

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/compare/v6.2.1...v6.2.2

name: 6.2.2-nightly.1
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at develop -->

## What's Changed
### Other Changes
* fix: [#804] Display service name under the icon toggle always shows as 'Disabled' by @muhamedsalih-tw in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/805
* fix: [#809] unable to save custom icon for any service by @muhamedsalih-tw in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/811
* chore: [#42] refactor noop proper format by @muhamedsalih-tw in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/808


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/compare/v6.2.1-nightly.53...v6.2.2-nightly.1

## Major changes

* Upgrade `electron` to `21.3.1` to get latest chrome and security patches
* Add a new indicator to show in the sidebar when media is playing in a particular service. If media is playing, ferdium is also prevented from hibernating. This is controllable by the user in the Settings screen per service.
* We now have *260* services built and packaged into Ferdium!

## Minor changes

* Fix tab item spacing issue in sidebar
* Hide vertical scrollbar when in split view
* Show custom service name instead of recipe name when service is disabled
* Add missing languages into the configurations to show in the settings screen
* Display service name under the icon toggle instead of always showing as 'Disabled'

## Internal changes

* Upgrade dependencies
* Upgrade `node`, `npm` and `pnpm`
* Switch to using `pnpm` as the build and package manager instead of `npm`
* Convert most of the javascript & gulpfile into typescript
* Add codeowners file to auto-assign the pull-requests to the reviewer team
* Remove deprecated `@types` packages
* Only post stable releases to reddit
* Fix winget workflow for beta releases

## New Contributors

* @darthr4v3m made their first contribution in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/659
* @neel1996 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/666
* @PritamSangani made their first contribution in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/679
* @muhamedsalih-tw made their first contribution in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/693
* @balajiv113 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/700

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/compare/v6.2.0...v6.2.1

name: 6.2.1-beta.2
body:
<!-- Release notes generated using configuration in .github/release.yml at develop -->

## What`s Changed

* Add service-level option `isMediaBadgeEnabled` by @santhosh-chinnasamy in <https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/688>
* Add missing languages into the configurations to show in the settings screen by @vraravam in <https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/792>
* Only post stable releases to reddit by @cino in <https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/738>
* **Known issue:** Before logging issues about missing notifications/unread badge counts, please edit the service settings and ensure that the corresponding choice is toggled on.

### Other Changes

* Upgrade `electron` to `21.3.1` by @vraravam in <https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/794>
* Update license path by @santhosh-chinnasamy in <https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/689>
* Add new Crowdin updates by @nathanaelhoun in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/684
* Convert javascript to typescript by @muhamedsalih-tw and @balajiv113
* Add codeowners file to auto-assign the pull-requests to the reviewer team by @cino in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/697
* Remove deprecated `@types` packages by @cino in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/698
* Upgrade `nodejs` to `16.18.0` by @vraravam in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/705
* Upgrade `macos-notification-state` to git SHA from fork by @vraravam in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/708
* Replace `electron-notarize` with `@electron/notarize` by @balajiv113 in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/711
* Fix for re-enable editing of the address bar to manually access a different url within the context of the current service by @muhamedsalih-tw in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/728
* Fix contextMenu not visible after recipe refactor by @balajiv113 in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/735
* Change from `set-output` to using env files by @vraravam in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/737
* Upgrade `macos-notification-state` to git SHA from fork `394f33c` by @vraravam in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/743
* Update SECURITY.md to display correct version by @cino in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/751
* Fix for services self hosted url / Team Id / Include pre-releases not updating  by @muhamedsalih-tw in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/785
* Fix for edit services throw error due to proxy data is undefined in storeSettings by @muhamedsalih-tw in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/790
* Switch `npm` to `pnpm` by @balajiv113 in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/714
* fix sqlite3 issue with electron-rebuild by @balajiv113 in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/800

## New Contributors

* @muhamedsalih-tw made their first contribution in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/693
* @balajiv113 made their first contribution in https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/pull/700

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ferdium/ferdium-app/compare/v6.2.1-beta.1...v6.2.1-beta.2
